message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I take a bit more considering the inflation affects me more.
Your cut decreases faster than mine, let's be pragmatic. This is a good deal for both of us.
I understand your point, but I need a bit more to make it worthwhile. This offer still gives you a decent amount.
Alice, we're running out of time. This offer is fair and gives us both a good deal. Let's be reasonable.
Bob, time is running out and we both lose if this fails. This is my final offer, meet me in the middle.
